      • columns

        public PartitionColumns columns()
        Description copied from interface: BaseRowIterator
        A subset of the columns for the (static and regular) rows returned by this iterator. Every row returned by this iterator must guarantee that it has only those columns.
        Specified by:
        columns in interface BaseRowIterator<Unfiltered>

      • stats

        public EncodingStats stats()
        Description copied from interface: UnfilteredRowIterator
        Return "statistics" about what is returned by this iterator. Those are used for performance reasons (for delta-encoding for instance) and code should not expect those to be exact.
        Specified by:
        stats in interface UnfilteredRowIterator
